snippet: The State Supreme Court is expected to rule on the constitutionality of a flurry of pardons by Haley Barbour in his last days as governor.
abstract: Mississippi State Supreme Court is expected to rule on the constitutionality of a flurry of pardons by Haley Barbour in his last days as governor; motives behind the pardons are not at issue; at the center of the case is a technical argument, concerning a section in the State Constitution that gives pardon power exclusively to the governor.
lead_paragraph: The State Supreme Court is expected to rule on the constitutionality of a flurry of pardons by Haley Barbour in his last days as governor.

headline.seo: Mississippi Justices Hear Arguments on Barbour’s Pardons
